sql_commands: SELECT id FROM trails WHERE name = 'Pancha Ranga Kshetram';
SELECT id FROM temples WHERE name LIKE '%Srirangam%' AND name LIKE '%Ranganatha%';

query_examples.description: Get all trails with temple counts
query_examples.sql: SELECT t.name, t.description, COUNT(tt.temple_id) as linked_temples FROM trails t LEFT JOIN temple_trails tt ON t.id = tt.trail_id GROUP BY t.id, t.name, t.description;
SELECT * FROM get_trail_temples(1) ORDER BY temple_position;
SELECT t.name, tt.position, tt.notes FROM trails t JOIN temple_trails tt ON t.id = tt.trail_id JOIN temples tmp ON tt.temple_id = tmp.id WHERE tmp.name LIKE '%Srirangam%';
